usefulItems: baking paper, small bowl, plate, serving dish
title: Salmon with mango sauce, snow peas and carrots

ingredients.content: 4 skinless salmon fillets (150-180 g each, 4 cm thick)
200 g carrots, cut into pieces (approx. 2 mm)
250 g snow peas, cut into halves
250 g mango, flesh only, cut into pieces (approx. 3 cm)
1 sprig fresh parsley, leaves only, for garnishing (optional)

preparations.content: Place cayenne pepper, salt, nutmeg and white pepper into a small bowl. Place salmon fillets onto a large sheet of baking paper, rub them all over with cayenne pepper mixture and fold baking paper into a sealed parcel, twisting the ends tightly. Place butterfly whisk flat into Varoma dish and place parcel on top of it to ensure some holes in the Varoma dish remain unobstructed. Insert Varoma tray, add carrots and snow peas and set aside.
Place mango, brandy, curry powder and water into mixing bowl, place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.Set Varoma aside on a plate to keep warm.

Add yoghurt, salt and white pepper and blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Remove salmon from parcel, transfer to a serving dish, sprinkle salmon with parsley (optional) and serve with sauce and vegetables on the side.
